definition: Lion city, nickname for Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]

sentences.english: According to government mandate in the Lion City, tipping is not permitted.
sentences.chinese: 根据狮城政府的规定，给小费是不允许的。

sentences.english: Wonder why now it's the best time to experience the roaring Singapore?
sentences.chinese: 想知道为什么现在就是体验狂欢狮城的最佳时机吗？

sentences.english: Wonder why there's no better time to experience the Roar of the Lion City?
sentences.chinese: 想知道为什么现在就是体验狂欢狮城的最佳时机吗？

sentences.english: "Triple-Romania letter" in Malay and Italy as "Singapore.
sentences.chinese: “信诃补罗”在马来文中意为“狮城”。

sentences.english: I had stayed in the Lion City then already. in this evening, I receive a phone call from one of my friends there.
sentences.chinese: 当时已经于狮城住，今晚当地的朋友拨电话来了。

sentences.english: I do always compare myself nowadays with the one as the time when I just arrived in Singapore.
sentences.chinese: 总是一次次地拿现在的自己跟当初刚来狮城的我相比。

sentences.english: I first visited Singapore in early 1997.
sentences.chinese: 第一次来狮城是在1997年初。

definition: Malacca or Melaka (town and state in Malaysia), also strait between Malaysia and Sumatra
Shuicheng county in Liupanshui 六盤水|六盘水[Liu4 pan2 shui3], Guizhou
Quanzhou prefecture level city in Fujian
Ipoh city in Malaysia, capital of Sultanate of Perak on Malayan peninsula
Qiandao Lake in Zhejiang, aka Xin'an River Reservoir, created as part of a large hydroelectric project in 1959
Indian coral tree/sunshine tree/tiger's claw/Erythrina variegata (botany)
Borneo island (of Indonesia, Malaysia and Brunei)
Kota Kinabalu (capital of Sabah state, Malaysia)
West Harbor/Hsikang township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
Chiang Mai, second city of Thailand
Johor (state of Malaysia at south of Malayan peninsula)
